name: Alea Research
title: Spotlight Series Hey Anon
text:
Synopsis
Hey Anon is developing a novel DeFAI (Decentralized Finance + AI) infrastructure that aims to make complex DeFi operations more secure, accessible, and autonomous through its AUTOMATE framework, which ensures strict validation of AI-driven financial transactions.

Key Insights
- Hey Anon has created the AUTOMATE framework, a TypeScript-based system that enforces strict schemas for DeFi interactions to prevent AI "hallucinations" or errors
- The project's ANON token has a fixed supply of 21 million, with 50% allocated to ICO participants
- The project offers a grants program ranging from $6,900 to $420,000 to accelerate protocol integrations
- Hey Anon's ecosystem already integrates major DeFi protocols like Aave, Compound, Lido Finance, and supports trading on platforms like CamelotDEX
- The long-term vision is to develop Decentralized Autonomous AI Organizations (DAAIOs) where AI agents handle complex financial operations under predefined parameters
- The project's AI research assistant Gemma can aggregate data from multiple sources, including on-chain metrics, social media, and developer activity
- The ANON token provides utility for accessing AI agents, governance rights, and ecosystem participation
